content_request: Bienvenue AZOUH
donne moi le ca des offres bundles

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    rcdm.year AS year, 
    rcdm.month AS month, 
    SUM(rcdm.ca_data) AS total_ca_bundles
FROM 
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS rcdm
WHERE 
    rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%JAMONO%' OR
    rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%KIRENE%'
GROUP BY 
    rcdm.year, 
    rcdm.month
ORDER BY 
    rcdm.year DESC, 
    rcdm.month DESC;
donne moi le ca des offres de type bundles

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    ds.year AS year,
    ds.month AS month,
    SUM(ds.ca_data) + SUM(ds.ca_voix) AS total_ca
FROM 
    daily_souscription AS ds
WHERE 
    ds.types LIKE '%BUNDLES%'
    AND ds.year = 2023 -- Assuming the current year is 2023, adjust accordingly
GROUP BY 
    ds.year, 
    ds.month
ORDER BY 
    ds.year DESC, 
    ds.month DESC;

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    ds.year AS year,
    ds.month AS month,
    SUM(ds.ca_data) + SUM(ds.ca_voix) AS total_ca
FROM 
    daily_souscription AS ds
WHERE 
    ds.types LIKE '%BUNDLES%'
    AND ds.year = 2025 -- Assuming the current year is 2023, adjust accordingly
GROUP BY 
    ds.year, 
    ds.month
ORDER BY 
    ds.year DESC, 
    ds.month DESC;

donne moi le ca cartes
donne moi le ca par cartes bancaires
donne moi le ca cartes

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    r.year AS year, 
    r.month AS month,
    SUM(r.ca_data) AS total_ca_data
FROM 
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS r
JOIN 
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_ca_data_monthly) AS max_year_subquery 
ON 
    r.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
GROUP BY 
    r.year, r.month
ORDER BY 
    r.year DESC, r.month DESC;
donne moi le ca cartes et le ca wave

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(ca_cartes) AS total_ca_cartes,
    SUM(ca_wave) AS total_ca_wave
FROM 
    reporting_ca_monthly
WHERE 
    year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY 
    year, month
ORDER BY 
    year DESC, month DESC;
donne moi le ca cartes

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(ca_cartes) AS ca_cartes_total
FROM 
    reporting_ca_monthly
WHERE 
    year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY 
    year, month
ORDER BY 
    year DESC, month DESC;
